attributes.action: provide better facilities for recycling IT equipment and disposal of electrical goods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Society only learned about the dangers of CFC emissons from discarded refridgerators when it was too late. The petitioner is calling for the govt to conduct a health impact assessment of IT equipment use and it's disposal. 

Cash Convertors, send back envelopes for ink cartridges and second hand shops already go some way to this, but this informal market is poorly regulated and no facilities exist specifically for electrical goods disposal other than the local tip. There must be a better way than this.
